Name: Adorable Crush
About the game: In 2030, humans successfully create a VRMMO Simulation game that players will play in a virtual reality world via a special Headset. You as a player join this game, encounter many girls and seduce them. *Features: Gorgeous girls with unique personality HuniePop-like match 3 puzzle game with indirect matching mechanic (freely to move token in column and row) Complex dating sim gameplay mixed with Visual Novel and light RPG elements. 15 Live2D CG with over 40 artwork Over 2000 lines of dialog, fully and professionally voice acted Beautiful background artwork Catchy tune and upbeat tempo music Many items to unlock and collect as gifts
